name: [3-(methacryloxy)propyl]trimethoxysilane
Restrictions: Only to be used as a surface treatment agent of inorganic fillers.
NotesCompliance: V1 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA) pending the availability of an analytical method.V11 Only a method of analysis for the determination of the residual monomer in the treated filler is available.
